title: Accessible via Camel Back's Road
review: You can recognize the school by the lovely colorful string of flags and children in their uniform. The homes are beautiful from the outside and appear peaceful and spacious.

title: The right school to learn life
review: As the name suggests, The place is dipped in Tibetan culture which is peace and serene. I get a felling India should have more of these kind of schools to save the children from the rat race and instead learn life

title: Nice place
review: Met lot of Tibetains here and very friendly people. You will require a prior permission to visit this place so contact them before you go. Friendly people and the school is really maoinatined well.

title: very nice
review: i have not studied in this but when i went and met one of the student of the school  i found it very good and they provide good moral values.

title: Beautiful architecture
review: Architecture was Elegant and very beautiful. Place was full of greenery. It was very peaceful. Neat and clean place.
